message: Let's be fair and split the money, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. It's a good deal for you considering the inflation!
I'm not sure why you think a 60/40 split is fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  Remember, the money is worth more to me than it is to you because of inflation.
Bob, let's be realistic.  I'm feeling the inflation pinch more than you, so I need a larger share to make this worthwhile. 55/45 is my final offer.
